text: Arazir kamɨn God ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavibar gan fogham, ia guizbangɨra nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an iti, o puvatɨ. E fo, gol a bizir aghuim, eghtɨ me avimɨn a tuaghɨva, a gɨfogham, a guizɨn gol, o puvatɨ. Ezɨ gol a gɨvaghamin bizim. Ezɨ en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim gol bar a gafira. Kamaghɨn amizɨma arazaraziba ia bativtɨma, ia fogh, ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn iti. Eghtɨ dughiar Krais Iesus ua izamim, a bar ia gakueghɨva, ian ziaba fɨva ziar ekiaba ia danɨngam.
